name: Keroro RPG: Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku
name_original: Keroro RPG: Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku
description:
Keroro RPG: Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku is a RPG game developed by Namco Tales Studio. It came out on 04-03-2010. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
You can play Keroro RPG: Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku on Nintendo DS.
Hiroshi Tamura, Kenta Yabe and Shinji Tamura scored the game.
